message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. However, $120 is a bit steep for me right now.  I'm willing to pay $105 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $105. I'm willing to compromise at $115, but I'm not going any lower than that. I think you'll really enjoy this product and it's worth every penny!
